    • Method Detail

      • getContexEntityManagerFactory

        public static ContexEntityManagerFactory getContexEntityManagerFactory(String persistenceUnit)
        Returns the ContexEntityManagerFactory for given persistence unit. Repeated calls for the same persistence unit will always return the same instance. The ContexEntityManagerFactory should be configured using the configure(Properties) method before creating an EntityManager.
        Parameters:
        persistenceUnit -
        Returns:
        the one and only instance for given persistence unit

      • getContexEntityManagerFactory

        public static ContexEntityManagerFactory getContexEntityManagerFactory(String persistenceUnit,
                                                       Properties properties)
        Returns the ContexEntityManagerFactory for given persistence unit. Repeated calls for the same persistence unit will always return the same instance. The ContexEntityManagerFactory is configured with the given properties.
        Parameters:
        persistenceUnit -
        properties -
        Returns:
        the one and only instance for given persistence unit

      • updateDatabase

        public void updateDatabase()
        Update the currently configured database.
        This simple sets hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto to update and executes SchemaUpdate.

      • dropAndCreateDatabase

        public void dropAndCreateDatabase()
        Recreate the currently configured database.
        This simple sets hibernate.hbm2ddl.auto to create and executes SchemaUpdate.

      • printDDL

        public void printDDL()
        Prints all DDL to stdout.

      • getFactory

        public javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory getFactory()
        Returns:
        the underlying EntityManagerFactory or null if this ContexEntityManagerFactory is not configured
